26#ifndef VICUS_ComponentInstanceH
27#define VICUS_ComponentInstanceH
28
29#include "VICUS_CodeGenMacros.h"
30#include "VICUS_Constants.h"
31
32namespace VICUS {
33
34class Surface;
35class Room;
36class SupplySystem;
37
42class ComponentInstance {
43public:
45 ComponentInstance() {}
47 ComponentInstance(unsigned int id,
48 unsigned int componentID, unsigned int sideASurfaceID, unsigned int sideBSurfaceID)
49 : m_id(id), m_idComponent(componentID), m_idSideASurface(sideASurfaceID), m_idSideBSurface(sideBSurfaceID)
50 {}
51
52 // *** PUBLIC MEMBER FUNCTIONS ***
53
54 VICUS_READWRITE
55 VICUS_COMPARE_WITH_ID
56
57 bool compare(const VICUS::ComponentInstance &ci) const {
58 if(m_idComponent != ci.m_idComponent)
59 return false;
60 if(m_idSideASurface != ci.m_idSideASurface)
61 return false;
62 if(m_idSideBSurface != ci.m_idSideBSurface)
63 return false;
64
65 // For now we ignore the other members during comparison
66 return true;
67 }
68
69 // *** PUBLIC MEMBER VARIABLES ***
70
72 unsigned int m_id = INVALID_ID; // XML:A:required
74 unsigned int m_idComponent = INVALID_ID; // XML:A
76 unsigned int m_idSideASurface = INVALID_ID; // XML:A
78 unsigned int m_idSideBSurface = INVALID_ID; // XML:A
79
81 unsigned int m_idSurfaceHeating = INVALID_ID; // XML:E
83 unsigned int m_idSurfaceHeatingControlZone = INVALID_ID; // XML:E
85 unsigned int m_idSupplySystem = INVALID_ID; // XML:E
86
87
88 // *** RUNTIME VARIABLES ***
89
90 // These pointers are updated in VICUS::Project::updatePointers() and can be used
91 // to quicky travers the data model.
92
93 VICUS::Surface *m_sideASurface = nullptr;
94 VICUS::Surface *m_sideBSurface = nullptr;
95
96 VICUS::Room *m_surfaceHeatingControlZone = nullptr;
97};
98
99} // namespace VICUS
100
101
102#endif // VICUS_ComponentInstanceH
